name: The King's Odyssey (DPhan Design)
description:
"After the War between Demon and God, the world is split into four dimensions, connected together by Limbo and was locked away by The 4 Pillars of Pangu. In each of these dimension, a spiritual monkey was born: The Six-eared Monkey, The Stone Monkey, The Horse Monkey and the Long-Armed Monkey. Each of them is the force of nature, who was bornt from essence of an Ancient God, Pangu and have the ability to control a respective Pillars of their dimension. The Story revolve around the struggle and relationship between the four monkeys and their journey to the final battle."

This is my graduated thesis project that I developed in 4 months. This is my adaption on "Journey to the West" (aka "Tales of the Monkey King"). The project was later join by my friend Ara Manassyan as the Sound Designer. 

"Journey to the West" has always been the biggest inspiration since my childhood and I plan to move this project forward to make it a full experience in the future. 

This prototype is an Atmospheric Action Side-Scroller that was inspired by other game such as Limbo, Muramasa: The Demon Blade, Sekiro, etc.

The first stage of the game is focused on the combat system, while the second stage of the game is focused on dialogue system and storytelling. 

I hope everyone have fun playing this little game and I would love to hear what you guys think about the game and what you would like to see it improve on. 

Thank you for playing!
